org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding

Class Binding

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dbasu.robomvvm.binding.Binding

  • public class Binding
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows binding of properties and actions between Components. Maintains weak references to both the source component and the target component, allowing them to be garbage collected even when the binding is alive. When either the source component or the target component is garbage collected, the binding is automatically unbound.

    • Method Detail

      • bindAction

        public static Binding bindAction(Component source,
                                 Component target,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends EventArg> eventType,
                                 java.lang.String action)
        Binds an event in the source component to an action in the target component. When an event of type eventType is raised by the source component, Component.invokeAction(java.lang.String, org.dbasu.robomvvm.componentmodel.EventArg) is called on the target component.
        Parameters:
        source - The source component.
        target - The target component.
        eventType - The event type in the source component that triggers the action.
        action - The action method name in the target component. The action method may take an argument of the supplied eventType, or may take no arguments.
        Returns:
        The binding created by this call.

      • bindProperty

        public static Binding bindProperty(Component source,
                                   java.lang.String sourceProperty,
                                   Component target,
                                   java.lang.String targetProperty,
                                   ValueConverter valueConverter,
                                   BindMode bindMode)
        Binds a property in the source component to a property in the target component. The directionality of the binding is specified using BindMode, and conversions between the source value and the target value are carried out using a ValueConverter.
        Parameters:
        source - The source component.
        sourceProperty - The source property name.
        target - The target component.
        targetProperty - The target property name.
        valueConverter - The value converter to convert between source and target properties.
        bindMode - The bind mode to be used for this binding.
        Returns:
        The binding created by this call.

      • bindProperty

        public static Binding bindProperty(Component source,
                                   java.lang.String sourceProperty,
                                   Component target,
                                   java.lang.String targetProperty)
        Binds a property in the source component to a property in the target component. Changes to the source property are reflected in the target property, but not the other way round. This corresponds to BindMode.SOURCE_TO_TARGET. A DefaultValueConverter is used.
        Parameters:
        source - The source component.
        sourceProperty - The source property name.
        target - The target component.
        targetProperty - The target property name.
        Returns:
        The binding created by this call.

      • bindProperty

        public static Binding bindProperty(Component source,
                                   java.lang.String sourceProperty,
                                   Component target,
                                   java.lang.String targetProperty,
                                   BindMode bindMode)
        Binds a property in the source component to a property in the target component. The directionality of the binding is specified using BindMode. No conversions between the source and the target values is performed.
        Parameters:
        source - The source component.
        sourceProperty - The source property name.
        target - The target component.
        targetProperty - The target property name.
        bindMode - The bind mode to be used for this binding.
        Returns:
        The binding created by this call.

      • unbind

        public void unbind()
        Unbind this binding. This method is automatically called when the source or the target component is garbage collected.

      • isBound

        public boolean isBound()
        Returns whether the binding is currently bound.
        Returns:
        True is the binding is currently bound. False otherwise.

      • getSource

        public Component getSource()
        Gets the source component
        Returns:
        The source component.

      • getTarget

        public Component getTarget()
        Gets the target component
        Returns:
        The target Component.

        protected void bind()
